allow:
Bash(powershell -Command "
$result = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''http://localhost:3000/api/admin/db-check'' -Method Get

Write-Host ''=== 샘플 데이터 \(store_counts\) ===''
$result.storeCategories.sampleData | ForEach-Object {
    $_| ConvertTo-Json -Compress
}
")

Bash(powershell -Command "Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''http://localhost:3000/api/admin/db-check'' -Method Get | Select-Object -ExpandProperty storeCategories | Select-Object -ExpandProperty sampleData | ConvertTo-Json")
Bash(if not exist docs mkdir docs)
